Reciprocal Lattice¶

The reciprocal lattice represents the Fourier transform of another lattice from real space into the momentum.

Pontryagin Duality¶

In harmonic analysis and theory of topological groups, Pontrygin duality explains the general properties of the Fourier transform on locally compact grousp.
